mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO place_spot ( ts_stnid, amenities, area_type, place_type, golf_strokes, golf_level, ground_type, par, ground_length, play_hole,
use_yn, ts_title, ts_tel1, ts_manager, ts_tel2, ts_zipcode, ts_road, ts_jibun, ts_detail, ts_extra, ts_location_code, ts_latitude, ts_longitude, ts_companynum, ts_employee, ts_homepage, ts_inside, ts_summary, ts_help, ts_holiday, ts_exiting, ts_exiting_inwon, ts_personnel, ts_useday, ts_usetime, ts_info, ts_youtube_code, ts_append, ts_write_id, ts_udate_id, ts_male, ts_female, ts_10s, ts_20s, ts_30s, ts_40s, ts_50s, ts_60s, ts_recreation, ts_epicurism, ts_experience, ts_culture, ts_leports, ts_other, ts_alone, ts_friend, ts_couple, ts_parents, ts_child, ts_group, ts_category1, ts_category2, ts_category3, ts_category4, ts_category5, ts_pets, ts_parking, ts_disabled, ts_nursing, ts_stroller, ts_credit, ts_weather_rain, ts_weather_snow, ts_weather_fog, ts_weather_gale, ts_season_spring, ts_season_summer, ts_season_autumn, ts_season_winter, ts_enrol_chk, ts_birthday, ts_start, ts_finish, ts_writdate) VALUES ( #{tsStnid}, #{amenities}, #{areaType}, #{placeType}, #{golfStrokes}, #{golfLevel}, #{groundType}, #{par}, #{groundLength}, #{playHole},
#{useYn}, #{tsTitle}, #{tsTel1}, #{tsManager}, #{tsTel2}, #{tsZipcode}, #{tsRoad}, #{tsJibun}, #{tsDetail}, #{tsExtra}, #{tsLocationCode}, #{tsLatitude}, #{tsLongitude}, #{tsCompanynum}, #{tsEmployee}, #{tsHomepage}, #{tsInside}, #{tsSummary}, #{tsHelp}, #{tsHoliday}, #{tsExiting}, #{tsExitingInwon}, #{tsPersonnel}, #{tsUseday}, #{tsUsetime}, #{tsInfo}, #{tsYoutubeCode}, #{tsAppend}, #{tsWriteId}, #{tsUdateId}, #{tsMale}, #{tsFemale}, #{ts10s}, #{ts20s}, #{ts30s}, #{ts40s}, #{ts50s}, #{ts60s}, #{tsRecreation}, #{tsEpicurism}, #{tsExperience}, #{tsCulture}, #{tsLeports}, #{tsOther}, #{tsAlone}, #{tsFriend}, #{tsCouple}, #{tsParents}, #{tsChild}, #{tsGroup}, #{tsCategory1}, #{tsCategory2}, #{tsCategory3}, #{tsCategory4}, #{tsCategory5}, #{tsPets}, #{tsParking}, #{tsDisabled}, #{tsNursing}, #{tsStroller}, #{tsCredit}, #{tsWeatherRain}, #{tsWeatherSnow}, #{tsWeatherFog}, #{tsWeatherGale}, #{tsSeasonSpring}, #{tsSeasonSummer}, #{tsSeasonAutumn}, #{tsSeasonWinter}, #{tsEnrolChk}, DATE(STR_TO_DATE(#{strTsBirthday},'%Y-%m-%d')), TIME(STR_TO_DATE(#{strTsStart},'%H:%i:%S')), TIME(STR_TO_DATE(#{strTsFinish},'%H:%i:%S')), now())
mapper.update:
Update place_spot
ts_stnid=#{tsStnid}, ts_title=#{tsTitle}, ts_tel1=#{tsTel1}, area_type=#{areaType}, place_type=#{placeType}, golf_strokes=#{golfStrokes}, golf_level=#{golfLevel}, ground_type=#{groundType}, par=#{par}, ground_length=#{groundLength}, play_hole=#{playHole},
use_yn=#{useYn}, ts_manager=#{tsManager}, ts_tel2=#{tsTel2}, ts_zipcode=#{tsZipcode}, ts_road=#{tsRoad}, ts_jibun=#{tsJibun}, ts_detail=#{tsDetail}, ts_extra=#{tsExtra}, ts_location_code=#{tsLocationCode}, ts_latitude=#{tsLatitude}, ts_longitude=#{tsLongitude}, ts_companynum=#{tsCompanynum}, ts_employee=#{tsEmployee}, ts_homepage=#{tsHomepage}, ts_inside=#{tsInside}, ts_summary=#{tsSummary}, ts_help=#{tsHelp}, ts_holiday=#{tsHoliday}, ts_exiting=#{tsExiting}, ts_exiting_inwon=#{tsExitingInwon}, ts_personnel=#{tsPersonnel}, ts_useday=#{tsUseday}, ts_usetime=#{tsUsetime}, ts_info=#{tsInfo}, ts_youtube_code=#{tsYoutubeCode}, ts_append=#{tsAppend}, ts_udate_id=#{tsUdateId}, ts_male=#{tsMale}, ts_female=#{tsFemale}, ts_10s=#{ts10s}, ts_20s=#{ts20s}, ts_30s=#{ts30s}, ts_40s=#{ts40s}, ts_50s=#{ts50s}, ts_60s=#{ts60s}, ts_recreation=#{tsRecreation}, ts_epicurism=#{tsEpicurism}, ts_experience=#{tsExperience}, ts_culture=#{tsCulture}, ts_leports=#{tsLeports}, ts_other=#{tsOther}, ts_alone=#{tsAlone}, ts_friend=#{tsFriend}, ts_couple=#{tsCouple}, ts_parents=#{tsParents}, ts_child=#{tsChild}, ts_group=#{tsGroup}, ts_category1=#{tsCategory1}, ts_category2=#{tsCategory2}, ts_category3=#{tsCategory3}, ts_category4=#{tsCategory4}, ts_category5=#{tsCategory5}, ts_pets=#{tsPets}, ts_parking=#{tsParking}, ts_disabled=#{tsDisabled}, ts_nursing=#{tsNursing}, ts_stroller=#{tsStroller}, ts_credit=#{tsCredit}, ts_weather_rain=#{tsWeatherRain}, ts_weather_snow=#{tsWeatherSnow}, ts_weather_fog=#{tsWeatherFog}, ts_weather_gale=#{tsWeatherGale}, ts_season_spring=#{tsSeasonSpring}, ts_season_summer=#{tsSeasonSummer}, ts_season_autumn=#{tsSeasonAutumn}, ts_season_winter=#{tsSeasonWinter}, ts_enrol_chk=#{tsEnrolChk},
ts_delete_yn=#{tsDeleteYn}, ts_birthday=DATE(STR_TO_DATE(#{strTsBirthday},'%Y-%m-%d')), ts_start=TIME(STR_TO_DATE(#{strTsStart},'%H:%i:%S')), ts_finish=TIME(STR_TO_DATE(#{strTsFinish},'%H:%i:%S')), ts_editdate=now()
and ts_id=#{tsId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO place_spot_image ( file_id, ts_id, service_type, upload_path, upload_filename, file_extension, file_size, file_mimetype, origin_filename, upload_id, sort_order, upload_date) VALUES ( #{fileId}, #{tsId}, #{serviceType}, #{uploadPath}, #{uploadFilename}, #{fileExtension}, #{fileSize}, #{fileMimetype}, #{originFilename}, #{uploadId}, #{sortOrder}, now())
